short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplifies follow other users between two different instances in the Fediverse(mastodon, misskey...)
short.ja: どのサーバーでもユーザーを簡単にフォローできる(mastodon, misskey...)
short.zh_CN: 简化您在两个不同的联邦服务器(mastodon, misskey...)上关注用户的流程

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplifies follow other users between two different instances in the Fediverse.
How to use
1. make sure you have already login on your major server
2. set server config in extension options page, token can auto get
3. goto other server and navigate to user profile page
4. click the extension icon, you will see servers that you can follow to
5. click the server button, if succeed the button will become green

If you need some help please open an issue in 
https://github.com/yahuli/follow-in-fediverse/issues/new
long.ja,zh_CN:
Simplifies follow other users between two different instances in the Fediverse.
Please see the video.
